channel.title: These forums
channel.description: Have degraded since when there were not so many members :( I dont feel part of this community any more :| Most people wont care, but what happend to everyone helping, now you get flames :rolleyes: My reasoning is a certain few members being dicks ;)

and piv (an admin there, wonder where he is at now?)

I talked to Piv and told him about these forums. He said that he isnt coming back to runescape cheating now but maybe later.[/quote]

oh well, later is better than never

item.title: These forums
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Algas:

Its just how these things goes. I myself hate to see when the oldschool users who should be an example for new users flames them and are sarcastic towards them. Thats something I would like to change.

When the forums grow and we get new people here its understandable that they want to become known here. Unfortunatly most of them spams and flames more or less. But I am happy to see that every now and then we see those users who really contributes to the community.

For example me... I remember when I started at kaitnieks.com. I was one of those so called ubernoobs. But if there wasnt users that were helpful and understanding towards me and other noobs I never would make it to admin here.

I would really like to see the old users not flame others, and be helpful to people too, dont get me wrong, most of them are nice, but weve got at least 5 or so that need to clean up thier attitude

And I was one of those noobs on kaitnieks too, I first signed up and asked if it was possible to make a private server, at the time it wasnt and piv (an admin there, wonder where he is at now?) kindly told me that winterlove was working on one, but hadnt got very far at all so dont ask about them anymore, but everyone was so friendly that I just kinda hung around, and here we are today I would like this place to be as friendly

Read full topic

item.title: These forums
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is still a lot of helping going on, and the staff deletes any and all flames we see

its inevitable as the forum grows larger there will be more posts and topics made, and a certain percentage of those will be spam or flame, its just a fact of life, try to ignore the bad people but still help everyone you can ;D

Read full topic
